project.name: C-C089A-WIRE-08-ST03-DT07-DF14-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C089A-WIRE-08-ST03-DT07-DF14-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Good inputs: 1) name of country for use in Sql databaseBad inputs:1) SQL argument injection 2) SQL command injection

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="USA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
